system.availability: Worn boots that can support up to 250kg over liquid surfaces. However if moving faster than full move action, must make +0 Agility Test or be forced to reduce movement to Full-Move. Failing by 2+ DoF causes user to fall, 4+ DoF user is inverted, boots above water, rest below. Imposes -10 on Silent Move and Shadowing Tests.
system.cost: Potentially Rarer versions exist that are Heat, Cold, and/or Chemical resistant for walking over dangerous liquids or in dangerous environments.
